name: Once upon a Spirit
description:
This game was made within a month for the IGMC 2017.

“We were out in the fields, collecting some food for the winter, when a crow attacked us and spooked my child so much, its soul escaped its body and clung itself to the bird!”

Story

You play as a mouse, whose kid's soul was stolen by a crow. A strange ghostly voice gives you the ability to switch into the spirit realm.

Gameplay

Visit some creepy places no one but you can see and solve some Point n Click like puzzles to finally reach the crow's nest.

Features
  • every of your interactions is at least slightly animated
  • hand painted environments
  • switch between two different dimensions
